NK041(di)014:1: // sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa la /
NK041(di)014:2: gzugs kyi lha mo 'od 'chang mas me long phul bas /
NK041(di)014:3: bkra shis pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabs pa de bzhin du /
NK041(di)014:4: deng 'dir yang rab tu gnas par byas pa'i rten
NK041(di)014:5: rnams dang bdag dang sbyin pa'i bdag pos gtso byas
NK041(di)014:6: sems can thams cad me long gi rdzas la brten
NK041(di)014:7: nas shin tu bkra shis par gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:8: me long ye shes rgya mtsho chen po yis //
NK041(di)014:9: ye shes rgya mtsho mchog tu dag gyur te //
NK041(di)014:10: rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i //
NK041(di)014:11: bkra shis des kyang sgrib pa dag gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:13: glang po che sa srung gis sman gi wang phul
NK041(di)014:14: bas gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa nad kyi sman
NK041(di)014:15: // sman mchog chos nyid rab tu rtogs gyur nas //
NK041(di)014:16: nyon mongs zug rngu med par gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)014:17: bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:18: zhing pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas zho phul bas zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pa ste //
NK041(di)014:19: snying po rnam dag ye shes rnams rtogs te //
NK041(di)014:20: yon tan kun gyi dbyings su gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)014:21: bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:22: bram ze kun+da l+ais rtsa d+aurba phul bas d+aurbasa tshe ni 'phel bar byed pa ste //
NK041(di)014:23: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ni rab bsgrubs nas //
NK041(di)014:24: nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)014:25: bkra shis des ni tshe yang 'phel gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:26: shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mas shing tog bilba
NK041(di)014:27: phul bas bilba rgyu rkyen 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos
NK041(di)014:28: // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod pa kun //
NK041(di)014:29: byang chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi //
NK041(di)014:30: bkra shis des kyang don kun 'grub gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:31: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dung dkar po g.yas
NK041(di)014:32: su 'khyil ba phul bas dung ni chos kyi sgra
NK041(di)014:34: ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du dag gyur te //
NK041(di)014:35: chos rnams ma nor yongs su ston pa yi //
NK041(di)014:36: bkra shis des kyang tshig dbang thob gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:37: sa'i lha mo brtan mas li khri phul bas li khri dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te //
NK041(di)014:38: chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang //
NK041(di)014:39: chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu brtan gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)014:40: bkra shis des kyang chos srid brtan gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:41: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes yungs kar
NK041(di)014:42: phul bas yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs te thams cad
NK041(di)014:43: du // bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa yi //
NK041(di)014:44: mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)014:45: bkra shis des kyang bgegs rnams zhi gyur cig /
NK041(di)014:47: skabs 'ga' zhig tu rgyas pa la mos na /
NK041(di)014:48: lha rdzas las byas lte ba shin tu zlum //
NK041(di)014:49: rtsibs stong ldan cing mu khyud rab mnyam bzang //
NK041(di)014:50: sdang ba'i dgra las rnam par rgyal gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)014:51: 'khor lo rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:52: rin chen ngo bo lha rdzas beed+aur+ya //
NK041(di)014:53: kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed cing //
NK041(di)014:54: dri med nyin mo ji bzhin mtshan de bzhin //
NK041(di)014:55: nor bu rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:56: gzugs mdzes lta na sdug cing tshul bzang ma //
NK041(di)014:57: pags pa'i mdog legs 'jam zhing dri mchog ldan //
NK041(di)014:58: yid 'ong 'dod dgu'i reg bya dang ldan pa'i //
NK041(di)014:59: btsun mo rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:60: gang yang rgyal ba mu tig mdangs ldan pas //
NK041(di)014:61: gser sogs mang po thub la phul ba ltar //
NK041(di)014:62: bzod ldan mtshungs pa'i khyim bdag nor ldan pa //
NK041(di)014:63: blon po rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:64: yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni //
NK041(di)014:65: rab gnas gangs can ri 'dra glang po che //
NK041(di)014:66: rgyal po la 'os mkha' la rab 'gro ba'i //
NK041(di)014:67: glang po rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:68: tho rangs dus su phyogs rnams ma lus pa'i //
NK041(di)014:69: sa rnams bskor zhing slar yang ldog byed cing //
NK041(di)014:70: rma bya'i mgrin pa'i spu ltar yid 'ong ba'i //
NK041(di)014:71: rta mchog rin chen dam pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)014:72: 'gro dang ldog dang kun nas 'ong gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)014:73: ma lus bdud dpung 'joms par byed pa la //
NK041(di)014:74: dpa' brtan 'byor pa'i dpung dang bcas pa yi //
